title: Today I quit Solo Queue.
body:
It was fun while It lasted. Wait, actually it wasn't. 

I've come to the realization that it's a toxic waste land. It's a fight of words about who's dick is bigger and who swings it the hardest. I'll continue to play Flex Queue w/ my other 4 homie G's but I'll finish Season 7 at Gold 3, 75.

To all of you toxic people.. Never mind, you'll just come back with something else.

Whatevs man. Solo Queue {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Welcome back to reality, friend. Have an upvote.
